page.title: 04Barnt Green Baptist Church
page.content: Each{Sunday morning}at 10.30 a.m. about 70 people meet at the church to worship God and to learn more about Him. While the adults listen to their message the children leave the service to go to their{Sunday school classes. On Sunday evening about 20 people attend the church. The church is not only used on Sundays. Monday to Thursday mornings the church is used by the village {playgroup}and on Thursday evenings there are two young people's clubs. Between 6 p.m. and 7 .30 p.m. 'Focus' provides an opportunity for 6 to 12 year olds to play and develop craft skills, while from 7.30 p.m. teenagers attend a{youth club. The Baptist church does not have a full time minister at the moment. It is run by the people who worship at the church.
